concept.title: Part I: Introduction to DITA
concept.shortdesc: This module introduces the fundamental concepts and benefits of DITA structured authoring.

section.title: Learning Objectives
section.p: Upon completing this module, you will be able to:

ul.li: Understand the fundamental challenges of traditional documentation methods and how structured authoring addresses them.
Define DITA and explain its core principles and architecture.
Identify the key benefits of using DITA for technical communication.
Compare DITA to other XML-based standards and lightweight markup languages.
